cards.name: Beater Grabs the Snitch
cards.description: Return a Match in play to its owner's hand.
cards.flavorText: 'Harry learnt that there were seven hundred ways of committing a Quidditch foul...'

cards.name: Bulgeye Potion
cards.description: You may use an Action and discard this card from play to do 13 damage to your opponent.

cards.name: Christmas Feast
cards.description: Put up to 4 non-Healing Item cards from your discard pile into your hand.
cards.flavorText: 'Harry had never in all his life had such a Christmas dinner.'

cards.name: Colour-Changing Ink
cards.description: You may use an Action to count the cards in your hand. Put them all on the bottom of your deck (in any order), and then draw that many cards.

cards.name: Draco Malfoy, Slytherin
cards.description: Once during each of your turns, when you use an Action to play an Item card, you get 1 more Action that turn.
cards.flavorText: '"My father's next door buying my books and mother's up the street looking at wands... Then I'm going to drag them off to look at racing brooms."' - Draco Malfoy

cards.name: Dragon-Hide Gloves
cards.description: Whenever a Creature does damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.

cards.name: Eeylops Owl Emporium
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.description: Each Owl has 1 more Health. Whenever an Owl does damage, it does 1 more damage.
cards.flavorText: '...Eeylops Owl Emporium — Tawny, Screech, Barn, Brown and Snowy.' - Shop sign in Diagon Alley

cards.name: Flourish and Blotts
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.description: Either player may use an Action and discard 2 of his or her Lessons from play to draw 5 cards.
cards.flavorText: 'They bought Harry's school books in a shop called Flourish and Blotts where the shelves were stacked to the ceiling...'

cards.name: Good Night's Sleep
cards.description: Choose 1 of your Characters in play that has a "once per game" ability you have already used. Use that ability.
cards.flavorText: 'After a good night's sleep, Harry felt nearly back to normal.'

cards.name: Gringotts
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.description: Each player gets 1 more Action on each of his or her turns (including the turn you play this card).
cards.flavorText: 'Enter, stranger, but take heed Of what awaits the sin of greed, ...' — Gringotts engraving

cards.name: Gringotts Vault Key
cards.description: Search your deck. You may take any card from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
cards.flavorText: '"You have his key, sir?"' —Gringotts goblin

cards.name: Griphook
cards.description: Once per game, you may make your opponent discard his or her hand. Then your opponent draws as many cards as he or she discarded in this way.
cards.flavorText: '"If anyone but a Gringotts goblin tried that, they'd be sucked through the door and trapped in there," said Griphook.'

cards.name: Gryffindor Match

description.toWin: Do 12 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
description.prize: The winner gets 2 more Actions during his or her next turn.

cards.flavorText: "...this year's team is going to be brilliant." — Fred Weasley

cards.name: Hagrid, Keeper of Keys
cards.description: You may use an Action to search your deck. You may take a Location card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
cards.flavorText: "...I haven't introduced meself. Rubeus Hagrid, Keeper of Keys and Grounds at Hogwarts." — Rubeus Hagrid

cards.name: Hagrid's Umbrella
cards.description: You may use an Action and discard this card from play to search your deck. You make take a Location card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. If you play this card, and you already have a Wand in play, discard the old one.

cards.name: Hebridean Black Dragon
cards.description: To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play.
cards.flavorText: '"But there aren't wild dragons in Britain?"' said Harry

cards.name: Hedwig
cards.description: When you play this card, you may put a non-Healing card from your discard pile into your hand.
cards.flavorText: 'He had decided to call her Hedwig, a name he had found in A History of Magic.'

cards.name: Hermione, Top Student
cards.description: Once per game, you may search your deck. You may take up to 2 Lesson cards from your deck, show them to your opponent and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
cards.flavorText: '...Hermione, of course, came top of the year.'

cards.name: Lee Jordan
cards.description: You may use an Action to reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all of those cards that need Quidditch Power into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck (in any order).
cards.flavorText: 'The Weasley twins' friend, Lee Jordan, was doing the commentary for the match, ...'

cards.name: Letters From No One

description.effect: Your opponent may only use Actions to draw cards.
description.toSolve: Your opponent discards 5 cards from his or her hand.
description.reward: Your opponent may draw two cards.

cards.flavorText: '...thirty or forty letters came pelting out of the fireplace like bullets.'

cards.name: Madam Irma Pince
cards.description: You may use an Action to put a Book card from your discard pile into your hand. (Lesson cards aren't Books.)
cards.flavorText: 'Madam Pince the librarian brandished a feather duster...'

cards.name: Professor Quirinus Quirrell
cards.description: Once per game, you may return all Creatures and Items to their owners' hands.
cards.flavorText: 'Even Professor Quirrell was temblin' ter meet yeh — mind you, he's usually tremblin'.' — Rubeus Hagrid

cards.name: Self-Stirring Cauldron
cards.description: To play this card, discard 2 of your Potions Lessons from play. You get 1 more Action the turn you play this card.

cards.name: Silver Unicorn Horn
cards.description: When you play this card, put up to 2 non-Healing cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck (in any order). You may use an Action and discard this card from play to shuffle up to 6 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Table Trouble
cards.description: Discard all Items from play (yours and your opponent's).

cards.name: The Famous Harry Potter
cards.description: Before each of your turns, if there are 4 or fewer cards in your hand, you may draw a card.
cards.flavorText: 'I'm famous and I can't even remember what I'm famous for.' — Harry Potter

cards.name: The Leaky Cauldron
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.description: Whenever either player plays a Character card, he or she uses up 1 Action to play it instead of 2.
cards.flavorText: 'This is it,' said Hagrid, coming to a halt, 'the Leaky Cauldron. It's a famous place.'

cards.name: Three-Month-Long Match

description.toWin: Do 30 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
description.prize: The winner does 15 damage to his or her opponent.

cards.flavorText: 'A game of Quidditch... can go on for ages...' — Oliver Wood

cards.name: Through the Arch

description.effect: Your opponent can't play Spell cards.
description.toSolve: Your opponent skips a total of 4 Actions. (Those Actions don't need to be one right after the other.)
description.reward: Your opponent may put an Item card from his or her discard pile into his or her hand.

cards.flavorText: 'Welcome,' said Hagrid, 'to Diagon Alley.'

cards.name: Vanishing Referee
cards.description: Choose a non-Healing Character in play (other than a starting Character) and shuffle it into its owner's deck.
cards.flavorText: '...referees had been known to vanish and turn up months later in the Sahara Desert.'

cards.name: Alihotsy Draught
cards.description: Do 6 damage to your opponent or choose 1 of his or her Items in play and discard it.

cards.name: Barn Owl
cards.description: When you play this card, you may discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play to put a Creature card from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Beetle Eyes
cards.description: When you play this card, do 4 damage to your opponent. You may use an Action to discard this card and Eel Eyes from play to search your deck. You may take a Bulgeye Potion card from your deck and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Biased Commentary
cards.description: The next time this turn you play a Spell card that needs Quidditch Power, if that card does damage to your opponent, it does 5 more damage.
cards.flavorText: ''So — after that obvious and disgusting bit of cheating —' 'Jordan!' growled Professor McGonagall'

cards.name: Bluebottle Broom
cards.description: You may use an Action to put a non-Healing card from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck. If you play this card, and you already have a Broom in play, discard the old one.

cards.name: Cauldron Shop
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.description: Either player may use an Action to search his or her deck. That player may take an Item card from his or her deck that needs Potions Power, show it to his or her opponent and put it into his or her hand. Then the player shuffles his or her deck.

cards.name: Colloshoo
cards.description: Look at your opponent's hand. If there are any Item cards there, choose 1 of them and discard it.

cards.name: Eel Eyes
cards.description: When you play this card, look at your opponent's hand. You may use an Action to discard this card and Beetle Eyes from play to search your deck. You may take a Bulgeye Potion card from your deck and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Frog-Spawn
cards.description: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to your Creatures.
cards.flavorText: 'I was the only one who saw her for what she was — a freak!' — Petunia Dursley

cards.name: Injured
cards.description: Look at your opponent's hand. Discard all cards from it that need Quidditch Power.

cards.name: Lapifors
cards.description: Choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures in play and discard it. Then search your deck. You may take a Creature card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Madam Malkin's Robes
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.description: Whenever a card (yours or your opponent's) does damage, it does 1 less damage
cards.flavorText: 'Madam Malkin stood Harry on a stool… slipped a long robe over his head and started to pin it to the right length.'

cards.name: Porcupine Robe
cards.description: At the end of each of your opponent's turns, do 1 damage to each Creature that did damage to you that turn.

cards.name: Practical Joke
cards.description: Count the number of Items in play (yours and your opponent's). Do that much damage to your opponent.

cards.name: Quality Quidditch Supplies
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.description: Either player may use an Action to search his or her deck. That player may take an Item card from his or her deck that needs Quidditch Power, show it to his or her opponent and put it into his or her hand. Then the player shuffles his or her deck.

cards.name: Spiral Dive
cards.description: Discard any number of cards from your hand. Do that much damage to your opponent
cards.flavorText: '...Harry streaked towards the ground like a bullet.'

cards.name: Verdillious
cards.description: Do 5 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

cards.name: Wand Shop
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.description: All Charms Lessons (yours and your opponent's) provide 2 Charms Lessons instead of 1 Charms Lesson.
cards.flavorText: '...Ollivanders: Makers of Fine Wands since 382 BC.' — shop sign in Diagon Alley

cards.name: Wild Boar
cards.description: To play this card, discard 2 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play.

cards.name: A Beginner's Guide to Transfiguration
cards.description: You may use an Action and discard this card from play to draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Bludger in the Stands
cards.description: Do 4 damage to your opponent. Then, if your opponent has any Items in play, he or she chooses 1 of them and discards it.

cards.name: Blue Wig
cards.description: Do 4 damage to your opponent. Then draw a card.
cards.flavorText: '...he'd somehow turned his teacher's wig blue.'

cards.name: Butterfly Weed Balm
cards.description: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Shuffle up to 9 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Cancelled Practice
cards.description: Choose 1 of your opponent's Quidditch Lessons in play and discard it.
cards.flavorText: 'The snow still hadn't melted next morning.'

cards.name: Dogbane Potion
cards.description: Choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures in play and do 3 damage to it.

cards.name: Dog Biscuits
cards.description: Remove all damage counters (if any) from 1 of your Creatures in play. Then draw a card.

cards.name: Fantastic Beasts & Where to Find Them
cards.description: You may use an Action and discard this card from play to draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Flipendo
cards.description: Do 2 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.
cards.flavorText: '...no magic should be used between classes in the corridors.' — Albus Dumbledore

cards.name: Freeze!
cards.description: Choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures in play and do 4 damage to it.

cards.name: Magical Drafts and Potions
cards.description: You may use an Action and discard this card from play to draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Mid-air Collision
cards.description: Do 10 damage to your opponent. Then choose 1 of your cards in play (other than your starting character) and discard it.

cards.name: Moonseed Poison
cards.description: When you play this card, do 3 damage to your opponent. You may use an Action and discard this card from play to do 6 damage to your opponent.

cards.name: Picking on Neville
cards.description: Choose 1 of your opponent's cards in play (other than his or her starting character) and discard it. Your opponent may prevent this by choosing 2 of his or her cards in play (other than his or her starting character) and discarding them.
cards.flavorText: '...Neville managed to have an extraordinary number of accidents...'

cards.name: Pigley Dudley
cards.description: Choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures or Characters in play (other than his or her starting character) and put it on top of his or her deck.
cards.flavorText: '...I suppose he was so much like a pig anyway there wasn't much left ter do.' — Rubeus Hagrid

cards.name: Quick Thinking
cards.description: Do 3 damage to your opponent or draw 3 cards.
cards.flavorText: '...Alicia Spinnet, a good friend of Oliver Wood's, last year only a reserve...'' — Lee Jordan, commentator

cards.name: Quidditch Through the Ages
cards.description: You may use an Action and discard this card from play to draw 3 cards.

cards.name: River Troll
cards.description: To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play.
cards.flavorText: '...they're supposed to be really stupid,' said Ron.'

cards.name: Screech Owl
cards.description: When you play this card, you may put a Lesson card from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Sloth Grip
cards.description: During your opponent's next turn, you may prevent all but the first 3 damage done to you.
cards.flavorText: '...that's Chaser Katie Bell of Gryffindor there…' — Lee Jordan, commentator

cards.name: Spongify
cards.description: Choose a non-Healing Item in play and return it to its owner's hand. Then draw a card.

cards.name: Swelling Potion
cards.description: Do 5 damage to your opponent. During your opponent's next turn, he or she can't use Actions to play Item cards.

cards.name: Tawny Owl
cards.description: When you play this card, you may put a non-Healing Item card from your discard pile into your hand.
cards.flavorText: 'All the kids want owls, they're dead useful...' — Rubeus Hagrid

cards.name: Teacup to Rat
cards.description: Choose 1 of your opponent's Items in play and discard it. Then draw a card.
cards.flavorText: 'Oh, she... came home every holiday... turning teacups into rats.' — Petunia Dursley

cards.name: The Standard Book of Spells (Grade 1)
cards.description: You may use an Action and discard this card from play to draw 3 cards.
